column4: What is the normal idle load average? I'm getting ~0.5 with all applets and widgets running on a 500Mhz. CPU.
there really isn't a "normal" idle load average. That said, .5 is low enough you shouldn't be waiting on much.
thx, I was afraid 500Mhz is too slow.

if you have speed issues, and are running standard ubuntu, you may want to try xfce instead of gnome. you can install with: sudo apt-get install xubuntu and then you'll be able to switch back and forth between both. xfce tends to be nicer to slow procs.
